title:
Countdown until
the New Horizons spacecraft
meets Pluto
content:
The New Horizons spacecraft will pass Pluto at its closest approach on
July 14, 2015 at 11:49:59 UTC.
invitation:
We're are hoping to launch soon and share with you the exciting history
of the discovery of Pluto! Subscribe to receive a notification.
thanks-msg: A notification will be emailed to you on the day of the launch.
Would you like to support this website? By donating, you help us create further projects that popularize scientific knowledge.
error: Oops! Make sure that the email address you entered is correct.
error-email-exists: Hmm... It looks like you have already subscribed.
error-other: Something went wrong. Try again in a couple of minutes.
